sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm' export default function AddPlacePopup({isAddPlacePopupOpen, handleCloseClickOverlay, onAddPlace}) { const [title, setTitle] =React.useState() const [link, setLink] = React.useState() onAddPlace([title, link]) return ( setTitle(e.target.value)} /> setLink(e.target.value)} /> ) }
